titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Virginia Tech Young Democrats Scrapbook, 1986-1987
titlestmt.subtitle: Virginia Tech Young Democrats Scrapbook 2014-005

defitem.label: Processed by: Kira A. Dietz, Archivist,

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection includes a scrapbook from the Young Democrats at Virginia Tech dating from 1986-1987. The scrapbook contains administrative information, memorabilia and photographs from the Virginia Young Democrats Convention, materials from service projects, invites to club events/programs, and items from the 1986 state and national elections, and newsclippings.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Virginia Tech Young Democrats Scrapbook must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Virginia Tech Young Democrats Scrapbook, Ms2014-005, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Virginia Tech Young Democrats Scrapbook was donated to Special Collections in March 2014.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Virginia Tech Young Democrats Scrapbook was completed in April 2014.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection includes a scrapbook from the Young Democrats at Virginia Tech dating from 1986-1987. The scrapbook contains administrative information, memorabilia and photographs from the Virginia Young Democrats Convention, materials from service projects, invites to club events/programs, and items from the 1986 state and national elections, and newsclippings. The administrative information includes bylaws, the Constitution, and a list of officers. Many of the items in the scrapbook are flyers and informational pamphlets about speaker series, projects, and events sponsored by the club. The collection also features an award to the club in recognition of the "Best Small Young Democrat Club" in 1986.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Virginia Tech Young Democrats began prior to 1985. The club held speakers series, sponsored and worked on service projects, campaigned for political officials, and attended conventions. As of 2014, the club continues to be active on the Virginia Tech campus.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Materials
separatedmaterial.p: The donation included three issues of The Virginia Tech Young Democrat (Vol 1, Nos. 1-3), a monthly newsletter. These were removed from the collection and cataloged for the Special Collections Rare Book Collection.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: University History
